entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who is speaking to Harry Potter. He mentions that he knew Harry was like him and asks if it was his mother or father.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the one being spoken to by Hagrid. He denies knowing what Hagrid means.

relationships.description: Hagrid knew Harry was like him.
Hagrid asked Harry if it was his mother or father that he was like.
